name: Screen Settings
text:
Modern displays allow for a multitude of calibration options, from your screens resolution, to the number of colors it will render. The calibration of these can effect your browsing experience.

Changing your devices resolution

Mac

  • Open System Preferences
  • Click Displays
  • Click the Color tab
  • Adjust monitor to your desired settings

Adjust Retina Display (Mac)

  • Open System Preferences
  • Click Displays
  • Click the Displays tab
  • Adjust your scaling preference and rotation
